meanings.definition: A substance used with water for washing and cleaning.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new soaps to keep my hands clean.
meanings.sent2: She used different soaps to wash the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The soaps in the bathroom started singing when I turned on the water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like soaps in a washing machine.
meanings.sent5: The soaps smelled like a field of flowers after the rain.

meanings.definition: A television or radio drama series.
meanings.sent1: My grandma loves watching her favorite soaps every afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The soaps on TV always have dramatic storylines.
meanings.sent3: The soaps on the radio made me laugh so hard I spilled my drink.
meanings.sent4: The soaps on TV are like a rollercoaster of emotions.
meanings.sent5: I got hooked on the soaps and couldn't stop watching.
